title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Anime Comic ; Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Animation Comic ; ドラゴンボール超 スーパーヒーロー
status: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Anime Comic ; Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero Animation Comic ; ドラゴンボール超 スーパーヒーロー
description:
Description :
        The Red Ribbon Army was once destroyed by Son Goku. Individuals who carry on its spirit have created the ultimate androids -- Gamma 1 and Gamma 2. Who will save the world and defeat the Red Ribbon Army?!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1: Revival Of The Red Ribbon Army
